Player Size modifier [ukuneko]
42000000 92000000
08BAD17C uuuuuuuu
20020004 00000000
08BAEF5C vvvvvvvv
20020004 00000000
08BAEA1C wwwwwwww
20020004 00000000
08BAF6BC xxxxxxxx
20020004 00000000
08C9B9FC yyyyyyyy
20020004 00000000
08C9CC9C zzzzzzzz
20020004 00000000
E0000000 80008000
u - whole body
v - Hat, hair
w - Face (excluding accessories)
x - Accessories
y - Equipment item
z - fishing buoy
Def - 3F800000

14000000 DB060000
14000004 43A60000
E0000000 80008000
Z+control Pad - Horizontal,Vertical.
Z+A - Zoom in
Z+B - Zoom out
B - Direction of the viewpoint(Like a Z-Targeting)
Z+C+A+B - Reset
*Change is kept, the viewpoint position.

*up+(-) open checkroom menu.
*down+(-) open catalog menu.
*Hold the button menu to appear.
*Hold Z to complete the order, send the item directly to empty pocket slot.
*Delivery will not be.
